mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expendable_type (expendable_type_id, expendable_type_name, level, parent_id, description) VALUES (#{expendableTypeId}, #{expendableTypeName}, #{level}, #{parentId}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT id, expendable_type_id, expendable_type_name, level, parent_id, description FROM expendable_type ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE expendable_type SET expendable_type_id = #{expendableTypeId}, expendable_type_name = #{expendableTypeName}, level = #{level}, parent_id = #{parentId}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
